entry.title: LESS IS MORE ZUCCHINI👩‍🍳 You can pan fry it OR grill it on a barbecue (which adds a lovely smokiness). Definitely give this a shot!🫶 RECIPE (1 servings, 15min prep time): -1 zucchini (or what‘s left from it) Cut into big chunks. Pan fry covered in oil on

entry.title: SEXY CABBAGE 🔥 🥬 Let me tell you, this is some REALLY sexy cabbage!😼 RECIPE (5 skewers, 30min prep time): -1 small cabbage (pointed, Napa or savoy) Cut in chunks. Marinade: -3 Tbsp tomato paste -2 Tsp soy sauce -1 Tbsp vinegar or lemon juice -1 Tbsp mapl

entry.title: OLIVE OIL CARAMEL 😮‍💨 This is what you wanna put on top of your ice cream! 🍦 RECIPE (6 servings, 5min prep time): -60ml olive oil -60ml COLD maple syrup or agave -a pinch of salt Mix until emulsified. Use like caramel and store in the fridge up to 7 days
